casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Andrew Darrin RAMSEUR 388A10-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 20, 2016 Daniel Shatz, Assistant Appellate Defender, Benjamin Dowling-Sendor, Assistant Appellate Defender, Andrew DeSimone, Assistant Appellate Defender, Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender, for Ramseur, Andrew Darrin. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, Amy Kunstling Irene, Special Deputy Attorney General, Jonathan Babb, Special Deputy Attorney General, Jonathan P. Babb, Special Counsel to Attorney General, Sarah Kirkman, District Attorney, for State of N.C. Cassandra Stubbs, Attorney at Law, Christopher A. Brook, Legal Director, Burton Craige, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, James Coleman, Attorney at Law, Irving Joyner, Attorney at Law, Durham, for ACLU Capital Punishment Project, et al.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 19th of October 2016 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of October 2016."

Plaintiff-Appellee shall have up to and including the 28th day of November 2016 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
